message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but I'll leave you a small share.  Accept this and we're done.  Reject it and we'll see how this plays out.
You took a bold start. I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Let's see if you'll accept a more balanced split.
Okay, I'm willing to give you more, but I still want the majority.  This is my final offer before the inflation really bites.
You're running out of time to make a deal. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you have all the power.
